text: DWAD (1098 AM) Now Radio is a radio station in the Philippines. Crusaders Broadcasting System owns DWAD. Its studio is at 304 Shaw Boulevard, Mandaluyong City and its transmitter is at 209 E. De la Paz Street, Mandaluyong City. ==History== On March 5, 2021 DWAD's studio moved to Dulmao Sports Center in Mandaluyong. It was formerly at 209 E. Dela paz street, Mandaluyong. ==References== Category:Radio stations in the Philippines
title: DWAD
